fields.name: objectId
fields.doc: ZTF object identifier

fields.name: decmean
fields.doc: mean Dec in degrees

fields.name: decstd
fields.doc: standard deviation of Dec in arcseconds

fields.name: distpsnr1
fields.doc: Distance of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [arcsec]

fields.name: glatmean
fields.doc: mean galactic latitude in degrees

fields.name: glonmean
fields.doc: mean galactic longitude in degrees

fields.name: jdmax
fields.doc: latest Julian Day of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: jdmin
fields.doc: earliest Julian Day of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_g
fields.doc: Latest computed apparent g magnitude (see Note about Photometry in this page

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_g02
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in g band, with 2-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_g08
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in g band, with 8-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_g28
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in g band, with 28-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_r
fields.doc: Latest computed apparent r magnitude (see Note about Photometry in this page

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_r02
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in r band, with 2-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_r08
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in r band, with 8-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latest_dc_mag_r28
fields.doc: Latest Exponential Moving Average of apparent magnitude in r band, with 28-day timescale (see note)

fields.name: latestgmag
fields.doc: latest g magnitude of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: latestrmag
fields.doc: latest r magnitude of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: maggmax
fields.doc: maximum g magnitude of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: maggmean
fields.doc: mean g magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: maggmedian
fields.doc: median g magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: maggmin
fields.doc: minimum g magnitude of candidates that cite this object

fields.name: magrmax
fields.doc: maximum r magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: magrmean
fields.doc: mean r magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: magrmedian
fields.doc: median r magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: magrmin
fields.doc: minimum r magnitude of candidates that cite thisobject

fields.name: ncand
fields.doc: number of candidates that cite this object (integer)

fields.name: ncandgp
fields.doc: number of candidates that cite this object which have drb > 0.75 and isdiffpos = t(integer)

fields.name: ramean
fields.doc: mean RA in degrees

fields.name: rastd
fields.doc: standard deviation of RA in arcseconds

fields.name: sgmag1
fields.doc: g-band PSF magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec [mag]

fields.name: sgscore1
fields.doc: Star/Galaxy score of closest source from PS1 catalog 0 <= sgscore <= 1 where closer to 1 implies higher likelihood of being a star

fields.name: srmag1
fields.doc: r-band PSF magnitude of closest source from PS1 catalog; if exists within 30 arcsec

fields.name: htm16
fields.doc: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh level 16

fields.name: sherlock_classification
fields.doc: Sherlock classification (NULL, AGN, BS, CV, NT, ORPHAN, SN, UNCLEAR, VS)

fields.name: sherlock_annotation
fields.doc: Sherlock annotation

fields.name: sherlock_summary
fields.doc: Sherlock summary

fields.name: sherlock_separation_arcsec
fields.doc: Sherlock separation from best crossmatch
